talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
Welcome, {user_nick}.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
Anything for the Blue Clan…!

$Ultima$
This raven symbol…

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_GustDragon_Jamihwa_qu9860_sp_01.ogg}
Are you here to buy something from the Goldfish Merchant Guild?
Shall I show you our wares inside?

${user_nick}$
That's okay.
I'm here with a small favor to ask.
I'm looking to get my hands on some Quality Certificates.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_GustDragon_Jamihwa_qu9860_sp_02.ogg}
Quality Certificate… Hehe, you came to the right place.
None of the small game merchants around here deal in that kind of thing.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_GustDragon_Jamihwa_qu9860_sp_03.ogg}
But unfortunately I can't help you right now.
We just delivered a shipment of specialty products, so I don't have any more on hand.

${user_nick}$
Really? Is there any other way to get one?

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_GustDragon_Jamihwa_qu9860_sp_04.ogg}
We usually only send someone to collect them once a month…
How about going to see an
acclaimed Heraldry scholarinstead?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do we need to do to meet him?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
He makes heraldry for Hwaran's army from within the palace.
As far as scholars in the field,
he is thought to have access to the most Quality Certificates.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, I brought you some specialty items when you were running short.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa${action:Talk}
Do you remember?
Back when the forbidden trade items were announced in the Edart Empire?

$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
The role you played that day, {user_nick}...
It seems he is aware of the good work you did.
He asked me to arrange a meeting with you.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_GustDragon_Jamihwa_qu9860_sp_05.ogg}
Knowing him will never be to your disadvantage.
Of that, you have my guarantee.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${action:Talk}
I owe you a favor, so…
I'll set up a meeting between the two of you, {user_nick}.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_GustDragon_Jamihwa_qu9860_sp_06.ogg}
Of course, I'll be charging a commission in return for my efforts.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'll pay the commission and get the Quality Certificates.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
(A commission… What should I do?)

※ If you have completed the Specialty Delivery Quest [VIP of the Merchant's Guild], you will be able acquire the Quality Certificates without paying a commission.
※ Carry out all the delivery quests of NPC Head Merchant Jamihwa and try to complete the [Collect All The Herring Cards] mission. Then you can accept the [VIP of the Merchant's Guild] quest.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
I'll send a message his way.
It will take some time to receive a response.

※ Head Merchant Jamihwa sent a letter to the scholar.
Wait a moment, then speak with her again.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
Anything for the Blue Clan…!

$Red Lotus Palace Guard$
*Panting*... Pardon me!!
Here is the response from the master!!

${user_nick}$
What does it say?

$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
When the red-combed bird shakes heaven and earth,
follow the waterfall over the fallen stone wall.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
He must have been worried my man would drop it while running here.
He made it hard to understand on purpose.

(Jamihwa smiles.)

${user_nick}$
I think I know where he is referring to.
I'll be off, then.

※ Knock down the stone wall near the bridge to Red Lotus Palace Garden.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#2b2723>(Blue Phoenix? That's another name for Ultima.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${sound:npc_GustDragon_Hakyul_qu9860_sp_01.ogg}
That smell…
Oh, Blue Phoenix! Is it you?!

${user_nick}$
Head Merchant Jamihwa told us about you.
I'm {user_nick}.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${action:Talk}
I knew it couldn't be…
Nice to meet you! I'm Heraldry Scholar Hakyul.
It's a pleasure to meet a champion of the Combat Tournament.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${sound:npc_GustDragon_Hakyul_qu9860_sp_02.ogg}
I brought the Quality Certificates.
Here you are.

(He produces six Quality Certificates from his pocket.)

${user_nick}$
You're just giving them to us? This many?

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
It's nothing, really. And it's my pleasure.
If it weren't for you {user_nick},
we'd have missed the specialty delivery deadline for certain.

${user_nick}$
Still, this many…
Thank you so much.

${user_nick}$
…Um, I was just wondering...
Why did you call me Blue Phoenix just now?

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${sound:npc_GustDragon_Hakyul_qu9860_sp_03.ogg}
Oh, you heard that?
My apologies. The Blue Phoenix is the nickname of an old comrade in arms.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${action:Refusal}
It's hard to imagine isn't it?
That I would be a war comrade of the great successor of the Blue Clan.
Of course, I gave up the sword for the pen long ago.
I was quite the warrior in my youth.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
I couldn't stand seeing the elders
suddenly prowling around like tigers as soon as our former leader passed away,
so I left the Blue Clan behind.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${sound:npc_GustDragon_Hakyul_qu9860_sp_04.ogg}
Funny as it may sound, I mixed you two up.
When I heard a nameless warrior claimed victory in the Combat Tournament and then helped us through the mess with the specialty delivery,
I thought my old comrade had returned…

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
… That lovely smell is familiar, {user_nick}.
My friend also greatly enjoyed dried sweetgrass.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
Haha, I guess I'm just an old man indulging in nostalgia.
Please pay me no mind.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
What?

${user_nick}$
The Combat Tournament cannot be won with the strength of just one person alone.
They couldn't come with me today, but I too have comrades of my own.

${user_nick}$
What I mean to say is…
It was not just a flight of fancy for you to have expected your old comrade.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${action:Talk}{sound:npc_GustDragon_Hakyul_qu9860_sp_05.ogg}
… Yes, I see.
I understand what you mean!

(The scholar smiles and his eyes get misty.)

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
If you don't mind,
would you deliver this letter to your comrade, then?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course. I'll be sure to deliver it.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
Yes. It was sent to the Blue Clan by some people in Byeoko Village.
Before I left I found carelessly tossed in a crate of tinder,
so I brought it here with me.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${sound:npc_GustDragon_Hakyul_qu9860_sp_06.ogg}
… Thank you so much, {user_nick}.
I'm glad he has such good friends as you.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
The Blue Clan is so utterly useless right now, they would ruin anything they touched.
I'm so sorry…

(Hakyul throws the letter into the flames.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(What was that he whispered to himself?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${action:Refusal}{sound:npc_GustDragon_Hakyul_qu9860_sp_07.ogg}
You must be strong.
Hope remains as long as you live.

${user_nick}$
Nice to meet you.
Head Merchant Jamihwa told me about you.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${action:Talk}
It's a pleasure. You must be {user_nick}?

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${sound:npc_GustDragon_Hakyul_qu9860_sp_08.ogg}
I've been looking forward to meeting you.
The rising star who claimed victory in the Combat Tournament.

(Hakyul looks {user_nick} up and down.)

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
Surely not…?
You haven't let beating an over-the-hill general go to your head, have you?
We in the Blue Clan have many secret moves left to play.

${user_nick}$
Just give me the Quality Certificate.

(This guy's been rude from the start… Could the likes of him really be in the Blue Clan?)

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
Why would a private citizen need a Quality Certificate anyway?

${user_nick}$
… We mean to procure a very expensive item.
It's for special delivery to Hwaran.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${sound:npc_GustDragon_Hakyul_qu9860_sp_09.ogg}
Don't get me wrong, but...
Do you think ingratiating yourself with the Lady will help you move up in the world?
It's amazing that someone as strong as you could be so naive.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
Remember that. My words of wisdom alone are worth more than any Quality Certificate.
…Now, let's talk payment.
I want one Silver Lotus Water.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${sound:npc_GustDragon_Hakyul_qu9860_sp_10.ogg}
I have no interest in negotiating.

※ To continue with this quest you need at least 1 Silver Lotus Water in your inventory.

${user_nick}$
I'll buy them. Just hand them over, the Quality Certificates.
All I need is 1 Silver Lotus Water?

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul${sound:npc_GustDragon_Hakyul_qu9860_sp_11.ogg}
That will be all.

(Hakyul walks toward the garden entrance.)

${user_nick}$
(They're not just gambling, but selling Quality Certificates on the black market…
Is there anything Ultima can do for them at this point?
It doesn't seem like there's one honest person in the Blue Clan left.)

${user_nick}$
Huh? This is…

※ Make this selection and 1 Silver Lotus Water will be deducted from you inventory.

$Heraldry Scholar Hakyul$
Did I not say I have no interest in negotiating?

※ To continue with this quest you need at least 1 Silver Lotus Water in your inventory.
Please check you inventory.

${user_nick}$
I think I know where he is referring to.
I'll be off, then.

※ Knock down the stone wall near the bridge to Red Lotus Palace Garden.

${user_nick}$
(This raven symbol…!
I should show this to Ultima.)

※ Rejoin your party in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace and show the letter to Ultima.

$Ultima$
You're back earlier than expected.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ocean Pearl! When did you get here?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Ocean Pearl$
It's been a while, {user_nick}.

$Ocean Pearl${sound:npc_GustDragon_Yuju_qu9860_sp_01.ogg}
I had a moment, so here I am.
The injured in Loser's Exile have recovered.
I hadn't seen Ultima in a few days too, so…

$Geraint${sound:npc_GustDragon_GereintKid_qu9860_sp_01.ogg}
Is she your wife?
She said she hasn't seen you in a few days.
The pursuit of justice is all well and good, but you gotta take care of the ones you love.

$Shalica$
…

(Shalica is lost in thought.)

$Ultima${sound:npc_GustDragon_Mugeuk_qu9860_sp_01.ogg}
I thought I was clear about that last time…!
Oh right, you weren't there.
Ocean Pearl is the one who saved my life.

$Norfe${sound:npc_GustDragon_Nophee_qu9860_sp_01.ogg}
Oh, how is Vernicka doing anyway?
Being the head of a neutral state is one thing, but as leader of an independent country it must be a lot different.

$Geraint$
Ha! Don't even mention that. Those damn relics.
Vernicka isn't ready for independence.
Am I right, Shalica?

${user_nick}$
Huh? What do you mean?

$Shalica$
… (Inaudible) keeps telling me to remain stationed at the headquarters.
Anyway, enough about that idiot. Did you bring the Quality Certificates?

${user_nick}$
Yep, I brought six in total. And…
Ultima, you should have this.

(You hand over the letter received in the garden.)

$Ultima$
A letter?
Written for me specifically?
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

$Ultima$
This raven symbol…

qstep_change.comment: 학율 만나는 스텝은 두 개지만, 저널은 하나를 같이 씀 3715 완료 - 3스텝 / 미완료 - 4스텝
퀘스트 아이템(품귀부, 서찰)은 있든 없든 백억만개가 중첩이 되든 상관 없고 백은 연자수는 반드시 다음 스텝으로 넘어가는 마지막 단계에서 삭제해야 함

journal.title: Goldfish Merchant Guild Head
journal.contents:
Merchant Yonhee informed you that Head Merchant Jamihwa who runs the Goldfish Merchant Guild, the largest of its kind in Red Lotus Palace, would be able to provide you with the Quality Certificates you need. Go to Jamihwa on Red Lotus Palace Main Street and tell her you came for some Quality Certificates.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street - Head Merchant Jamihwa
journal.destination: Talk with Jamihwa in Red Lotus Main Palace

journal.title: Clandestine Meeting
journal.contents:
You went to Head Merchant Jamihwa, but she informed you that Quality Certificates are not produced in great numbers and are difficult to procure. Instead of giving you one directly, she offered to introduce you to a major Heraldry scholar. You must now wait for a response from this scholar with regards to your request for a meeting.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street - Head Merchant Jamihwa
journal.destination: Talk with Jamihwa in Red Lotus Main Palace
journal.todo_msg: The guard brought a reply from the scholar.

journal.title: Red-Combed Bird, Fallen Stone Wall
journal.contents:
The reply from the scholar contains a metaphor indicating the meeting place.
"When the red-combed bird shakes heaven and earth, follow the waterfall over the fallen stone wall."
I think I know the place he's taking about…

Red Lotus Palace Garden - HeraldryScholar Hakyul
journal.todo_msg: Find the meeting place indicated by the scholar.

journal.title: Raven Letter
journal.contents:
You met Heraldry Scholar Hakyul and obtained the Quality Certificates. You also received something unexpected: a letter marked with a raven symbol… Ultima may know something about it. Return to the Streets of Red Lotus Palace and show him.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace - Ultima
※ Players who did not complete the [VIP of the Merchant's Guild] quest will lose 3 Silver Lotus Waters in the event they give up the quest at this stage and then try to accept it again. It is important to think carefully before abandoning a quest.
※ Players who have completed the [VIP of the Merchant's Guild] quest can resume this quest without any penalty.
journal.destination: Talk with Ultima in Streets of Red Lotus Palace.
journal.todo_msg: You acquired the Quality Certificates. Return to town.
